attributes.action:
(Sir) Lewis Hamilton to be knighted? 
Most successful British sportsman in F1
attributes.additional_details:
Lewis Hamilton. 
F1 world drivers champion. 
McLaren - 2008
Mercedes Amg - 2014/15/17.
attributes.background: From a council estate in Stevenage to a penthouse in Monaco he has now become  the most successful racing driver in British history after winning his 4th F1 drivers title, and therefore think it’s about time a motorsports driver should be recognised for outstanding achievements.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
